meanings.definition: The leaves of a plant or tree.
meanings.sent1: The green leafages on the tree rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of the leafages in the fall.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the leafages to play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The leafages danced gracefully as the sunlight filtered through them.
meanings.sent5: The leafages shimmered like emerald jewels under the morning dew.

meanings.definition: The collective foliage or leaves of a plant or tree.
meanings.sent1: The dense leafages provided shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The forest was a sea of leafages, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The leafages whispered secrets to each other in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The leafages formed a protective canopy over the delicate flowers below.
meanings.sent5: The leafages rustled in unison, creating a soothing melody in the garden.
